message: Hello Bob, I am excited to present our premium product to you. It's an exceptional opportunity that aligns well with your needs and interests. I understand its value to you is $12,000, but considering its unique features and benefits, I believe we can reach a mutually beneficial agreement. I am offering it to you today at a special introductory price of $14,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider this proposal carefully. Should you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I look forward to the possibility of working with you.
